About

5.0
Excellent
3,619 reviews
Location
Cleanliness
Service
Value
The Leela Ambience Convention Hotel, Delhi is an epitome of luxury with Indias largest convention facility and bears close proximity to Connaught Place and old Delhi monuments. Exhibiting sheer grandeur within its two towers encompassing 480 rooms and suites, two receptions, two temperature controlled swimming pools and gymnasiums, 25,000 square feet of pillar-less ballroom; the hotel boasts of Indias largest meeting space of 70,000 square feet. The 480 rooms are luxuriously appointed, out of which 126 are twin bedded rooms (highest in the country) and 25 are suites. With 45 square meters of area, each room displays state of art technology with four fixture bathrooms. Nestled on National Highway 24, the hotel is the quickest gateway to the Himalayas while Agra is just about a 2.5 hours drive. The Leela spoils its patrons with a choice of myriad cuisines through its 3 specialty restaurants, All Day Dine Caf Knosh, Oriental Mei Kun & Indian Dilli32, and a regally designed Cherry bar. The restaurants are well equipped to cater to a gathering of above 600 guests simultaneously during breakfast. Taking guest experience to a whole new level, the hotel provides a selection of wellbeing and relaxation offerings in one of the finest spas named Shanaya. The Grand Sapphire Ballroom can accommodate 3500 guests in theater style and seamlessly lends itself into five smaller ballrooms with flexible seating capacities. It is flanked by two beautifully designed outdoor patios, which provide an ideal setting for events. The hotel also has another ballroom, Emerald with separate pre-function area. Besides, it houses 30 breakaway rooms for 4 to 200 guests. The hotel is well equipped to park up to 700 cars within its premises. The two business centers with nine elegantly furnished boardrooms & three meeting rooms further showcase its versatility in business and convention areas.

Popular mentions
Ranjana wrote a review Yesterday
Chicago, Illinois 1 contribution
A true 5 Star Facility
I stayed at the Leela Ambience recently while visiting Delhi for a family wedding. The stay was superb - I could not have asked for more. Totally modern facility, clean rooms, excellent amenities, but most importantly, exceptional service - at every level. Also very good onsite restaurants (I enjoyed the newly re-opened Chinese restaurant). Try to book your room with breakfast option, as this includes an excellent buffet spread. I also took advantage of the hotel's car service for a few trips into central and Delhi. Hotel offers avery reasonable 3 hour or 6 hour package. Only caution there is that the driver took me to a few stores that I did not request. I wanted to go to Central Cottage Industries Emporium, a landmark Delhi store for tourists. He took me to two other Emporiums instead where I did not want to shop. Otherwise he was a great driver and I did not mind his effort to earn a small commission elsewhere. I compensated him with a good tip.

Hotel's Favourite
Treated like family
My wife and I had a short 2 night visit to Delhi and stayed at The Leela. Customer service, cleanliness and atmosphere well & truly exceeded our expectations! From the airport pick-up, we were given a tour around Delhi showing some of the local landmarks. The reception and concierge staff were extremely welcoming and helped celebrate our honeymoon on arrival. Overall I would strongly recommend making a booking at this hotel if visiting Delhi!
